licence_overview:
If you intend to burn specified plants outside of the burning season or in a way that is restricted you must apply to [Natural England](http://www.naturalengland.org.uk "Natural England"){:rel="external"} for a licence.

You must submit the proper form at least 28 or 56 days ahead of the planned burn, depending on whether you wish to carry out a burn in or out of season.
licence_short_description: Out of seasons or restricted grass and heather burning licence.
overview: Heather and grass burning licence outside the regular burning season
title: Heather and grass burning licence (England)
